remarks: If ` A ` is an ideal of subsets (a nonempty collection closed under subset and binary union) of the set ` D ` of finite bags (the primary applications being ` A = Fin ` and ` A = ~P B ` for some ` B ` ), then the set of all power series whose coefficient functions are supported on an element of ` A ` is a linear subspace of the set of all power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ mpllsslem as of 16-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

mplsubglemOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U = { g e. B | ( `' g " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. A } ) $.
